name: MyBurger - Food Ordering App
description:
Open Slide

Open Prototype


My Burger - Food Ordering App.

Food ordering application is a online platform for food and beverage business owners to sell their product. This kind of application commonly used by any type of businesses.

Using this application, people can order their meals by clicking their mobile phone anywhere and anytime.


Glad to mention that this is my first attempt to design full system application. It might be not 100 percent completed and perfect, but I do really enjoyed this process of learning and I hope so do you too.
